hero.subtitle: We create what you need for your brand to grow. Strategic design and modern technology focused on one thing: real results.

nosotros.label: ABOUT US
nosotros.title: We transform ideas into real digital solutions
nosotros.p1: At NEXCORE we are a web development agency in Florencio Varela and Buenos Aires, formed by university students and programming enthusiasts passionate about technology and digital innovation. We specialize in transforming ideas into functional, scalable web solutions focused on results.
nosotros.p2: We develop professional websites, optimized landing pages and custom systems, accompanying businesses, entrepreneurs and professionals in growing their online presence. We believe in the balance between modern design, performance, SEO optimization and clear, close communication.
nosotros.p3: Our goal is to provide a simple, transparent and efficient work process, building digital solutions that bring real value and help our clients stand out on the internet.
nosotros.card1: Real commitment to every project we undertake.
nosotros.card2Text: Close support and assistance when your project needs it.
nosotros.card3Text: Projects focused on UX/UI and conversion for your users.
nosotros.card4Text: Optimization for visibility, speed and better results.

proceso.label: OUR PROCESS
proceso.title: From idea to launch
proceso.card1Text: We talk about your idea, your goals and the type of project you need. We define if the best option for you is a landing page, institutional website, personal web or custom development.
proceso.card2Text: We create modern, clear design aligned with your brand. We present visual prototypes so you can see the final look and structure of your web before development.
proceso.card3Text: We work with the technology that best fits your project. Depending on your needs, we can develop custom solutions with code or use low-code tools like WordPress.
proceso.card4Text: We upload your site and have it running 100%, optimized and ready to receive visits from day one. We adjust final details to ensure a smooth experience.

servicios.label: OUR SERVICES
servicios.title: Digital solutions that boost your business
servicios.subtitle: We combine strategy, design and technology to create digital products that generate real and scalable results.
servicios.service1Text: Fast, modern pages focused on converting. Ideal for campaigns and specific products.
servicios.service2Text: Complete and professional websites to showcase your company information: services, team and contact.
servicios.service3Text: Portfolios and personal websites designed to boost your professional brand and showcase your services.
servicios.service4Text: Applications and online stores tailored to your business: scalable, secure and ready to grow.
servicios.service5Text: Maintenance, support and optimizations to keep your site running 100%.
servicios.service6Text: Design focused on conversion and experience, with prototypes and usability tests.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.subtitle: Let's talk and transform your idea into a website that attracts customers and grows with your business.

proyectos.label: PORTFOLIO
proyectos.title: Projects that
proyectos.subtitle: Each project is an opportunity to create exceptional digital experiences that drive our clients' growth.
proyectos.project1Text: A modern and visually attractive website designed for a professional barbershop. It showcases their services, team and work style with careful aesthetics, conveying quality, trust and a premium experience from the first glance.
proyectos.project2Text: Online store with optimized purchasing flow, product filters and design focused on conversion and usability.
proyectos.project3Text: Custom web application with administration panel and user-oriented features. Modular design and optimized performance.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services.
faq.q1: How long does it take to develop a basic website?
faq.a1: A basic site or landing page usually takes between 1-3 weeks, depending on content and revisions. More complex projects can take between 4-8 weeks.
faq.q2: Do you offer maintenance after launch?
faq.a2: Yes, we offer maintenance and support plans for updates, security and continuous improvements. We also monitor performance and SEO.
faq.q3: What technology do you use to develop websites?
faq.a3: We use HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and modern frameworks like React or Vue depending on the project. We also work with WordPress for cases that require it.
faq.q4: Do you include images in the budget?
faq.a4: Yes, we include quality visual material. We can use original images or royalty-free images. For brand-specific content, we look for stock image options.
faq.q5: Do you include SEO in projects?
faq.a5: Yes, we include basic SEO optimization in all our projects: page structure, meta tags, load speed and responsive design.
faq.q6: What is the approximate cost of a website?
faq.a6: Cost varies depending on type and complexity. We offer personalized quotes with no commitment. Contact us for a detailed evaluation of your project.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear about it. Fill out the form and we'll be in touch soon.
contact.q3: Do you work with CMS like WordPress?
contact.a3: Yes. Depending on the project we recommend WordPress, headless solutions, Webflow or custom developments with HTML/CSS/JavaScript.
contact.q4: Do I need to provide content and photos?
contact.a4: It's ideal that you provide content and visual material. If you don't have it, we also help create it for an additional cost or find stock image options.
contact.q5: Do you include SEO in projects?
contact.a5: Yes, we include basic SEO optimization in all our projects: page structure, meta tags, load speed and responsive design.
contact.q6: What is the approximate cost of a website?
contact.a6: Cost varies depending on type and complexity. We offer personalized quotes with no commitment. Contact us for a detailed evaluation of your project.

pagos.title: Pay as You
